text: Hugh Burns (footballer) may refer to *Jock Burns, born 1894, played for Renton Glencairn, St Anthony's (Glasgow), Dumbarton Harp, Rutherglen Glencairn, Dumbarton, Renton, Rochdale, East Stirlingshire and Oldham Athletic. *Hugh Burns, born 1965, played for Larkhall Academy, Cambuslang Rangers, Hamilton Academical, Heart of Midlothian, Dunfermline Athletic, Fulham, Kilmarnock, Ayr Utd, Dumbarton and Larkhall Thistle.
title: Hugh Burns (footballer)
